item.description:
This is not a TOSOB hosted STEPPIN event:

 
Twins & Friends present Harlem Nights – an incredible 30′s-themed event full of Harlem flavor but with a Boston spin.

TICKETS 1888.878.TWIN 

10 STEPPERS REQUIRED FOR DISCOUNT OF $20 PER PERSON

 

Come and see Mosley on the Charles transformed into"Ray's Place". This event will bring you back to the late 1930's in Harlem New York, but in Boston.

  Get ready to party with folks from all over the EastCoast! Are you ready to see some new faces?????****

Show time is at 8:00pm _ Get there early for the full Harlem Night experience!!!

The night will feature:

-Live Music Band

  -DJ's playing the hottest music

-Gaming Tables

Live photo shoot (capture your signature event attire    



Twins & Friends request guest to follow the proper dress code and dress within the theme.
***Men suggestions:

Single or double-breasted, pinstripe suites, tailcoat, zootsuit, with very high waists, pegged trousers, long coats, vest, tuxedo shirt,bow tie, suspenders, hanky, and opera scarf.
Men Hats: The fedora, often worn tipped down over oneeye at a rakish angle. The more conservative hats are the Homburg or the TopHats

 

***Woman suggestions:

Cocktail dresses, flapper, elbow length gloves, furs, minks,foxes,

Feather hats or head pieces, tilt hat, and finger waves.   This extravaganza will be held at Moseley's On The Charles(50 Bridge St., Dedham MA),in which will transform into "Club Sugar Ray"...just like the film
item.how_to_find_us: Mosley on the Charles transformed into"Ray's Place".

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: HARLEM NIGHTS presented by Twins and Friends
